name: Sudoku: Classic Sudoku Puzzle!
description:
Classic Sudoku is a logic-based, number-placement puzzle in which the player needs to fill a 9*9 grid through deduction based on the given numbers. The objective is to complete a grid where each row, each column, and each of the nine 3*3 regions contains all of the digits from 1 to 9.

Game Features:
· Four levels - Simple, medium, difficult, and master. It’s fit for both sudoku beginners and experienced players!
· Daily challenge – Complete the daily challenges to win unique trophies.
· Repetition highlighting –It helps you filter out repetitive numbers at each row, each column, and each region.
· Pop-up tips – Tips will pop up to help when it’s difficult to continue.
· Various themes – Chose a theme comfortable to your eyes.
· Automatic saving – The process will be saved and so you can continue the game at any time.
· Thousands of puzzles now, with a lot more coming soon.
· visualized and simple interface design.
· Easy to play with simple tools and a clear page layout.

Choose any level you like! Easy levels help to train your brain and master levels are instrumental in honing the mind. Sudoku also features new functions to make your game easier: tips, automatic checking, and repetition highlighting. Using these functions helps you to complete the challenge without turning to others for help. You are the true master!

Sudoku is everything from simple digits to deeper thinking; from rigorous logic to interesting puzzle-solving. Now, have a try and revel in the charm of numbers!
